languages.text: {n}Кажется, болезнь, подхваченная в моровой яме грузовой магистрали, прогрессирует: кожа чешется еще больше и местами начинает темнеть.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
хаос-исход
с игрок НЕ снимается LT_Contaminated_buff, потому что нечего молиться кому попало

хаос-исход
с игрок НЕ снимается LT_Contaminated_buff, потому что нечего молиться кому попало

languages.text: {n}It seems the disease you caught in the freight line's pestilence pit is getting worse. Your skin is more itchy, and dark patches are forming in a few places.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кажется, болезнь, подхваченная в моровой яме грузовой магистрали, прогрессирует: кожа чешется еще больше и местами начинает темнеть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It seems the disease you caught in the pestilence pit of the freight line is getting worse. Your skin is more itchy and has dark patches forming in a few places.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Krankheit, mit der du dich in der Pestilenzgrube der Güterstrecke angesteckt hast, wird wohl schlimmer. Der Juckreiz wird schlimmer, an manchen Stellen bilden sich dunkle Flecken auf deiner Haut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the disease you caught in the freight line's pestilence pit is getting worse. Your skin is more itchy, and dark patches are forming in a few places.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Krankheit, mit der du dich in der Pestilenzgrube der Güterstrecke angesteckt hast, wird wohl schlimmer. Der Juckreiz wird schlimmer, an manchen Stellen bilden sich dunkle Flecken auf deiner Haut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parece que la enfermedad que contrajiste en el pozo de pestilencia de la línea de carga ha empeorado. La piel te pica y en algunos lugares empieza a oscurecerse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the disease you caught in the freight line's pestilence pit is getting worse. Your skin is more itchy, and dark patches are forming in a few places.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parece que la enfermedad que contrajiste en el pozo de pestilencia de la línea de carga ha empeorado. La piel te pica y en algunos lugares empieza a oscurecerse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}貨物線の疫病の穴でかかった病気が悪化しているようだ。皮膚のかゆみが増し、数か所に黒い斑点ができている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the disease you caught in the freight line's pestilence pit is getting worse. Your skin is more itchy, and dark patches are forming in a few places.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}貨物線の疫病の穴でかかった病気が悪化しているようだ。皮膚のかゆみが増し、数か所に黒い斑点ができている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}看起来，你在货运区域的疫病坑里染上的恶疾变得越发严重。你的皮肤变得更痒了，某些地方还长出了黑色的斑块。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the disease you caught in the freight line's pestilence pit is getting worse. Your skin is more itchy, and dark patches are forming in a few places.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}看起来，你在货运区域的疫病坑里染上的恶疾变得越发严重。你的皮肤变得更痒了，某些地方还长出了黑色的斑块。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La maladie que vous avez contractée dans les bas-fonds de la ligne de fret s'aggrave à vue d'œil. Votre peau vous démange plus que jamais, et des taches sombres apparaissent en plusieurs endroits de votre corps.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the disease you caught in the freight line's pestilence pit is getting worse. Your skin is more itchy, and dark patches are forming in a few places.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La maladie que vous avez contractée dans les bas-fonds de la ligne de fret s'aggrave à vue d'œil. Votre peau vous démange plus que jamais, et des taches sombres apparaissent en plusieurs endroits de votre corps.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Görünüşe göre yük hattının veba çukurunda kaptığın hastalık kötüye gidiyor. Derin daha çok kaşınıyor. Birkaç noktada ise koyu renkli lekeler oluşmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the disease you caught in the freight line's pestilence pit is getting worse. Your skin is more itchy, and dark patches are forming in a few places.{/n}
